EmailTemplate.description: Introduction to the support team, access details for webinars, and a link to the knowledge base for additional support and resources.
EmailTemplate.name: Launch: 1 week post launch
EmailTemplate.subject: One Week In – We’re Here to Help with Any Website Changes!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Contact__c},
Can you believe it’s already been a week since your website launched? We just wanted to check in and make sure you know how to reach us if you need any assistance with updates or changes.
You can connect with us through: Chat: Live chat with us from the platform Phone: 310-955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
For your convenience, here’s a quick link to our Help Center with plenty of useful resources.
We’re here to help, and we look forward to hearing from you soon!
Best, The Luxury Presence Support Team
